svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-08-17T09:10:56.029Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/109.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="vBbacTySjYu73jpjO-Um" version="21.6.8" type="device"> <diagram name="DevOpsPlan" id="RSTH0A9Fy7KfbpkQ3IGk"> <mxGraphModel dx="466" dy="360" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="m3cxBnHvqO1AkCnyJKCn-3" value="DevOps<br><br>- GCP for production and staging environment<br>&nbsp; - region: us-central<br><br>- production portal with free tier GCE&nbsp;<br>&nbsp; - e2-micro: 2 vcpu<br>&nbsp; - 1GB ram<br>&nbsp; - 30GB PD<br>&nbsp; - 1g network egress<br>&nbsp; - static ip (for production service)<br><br>- production&nbsp; backend and CICD env with free tier GKS<br>&nbsp; - no managment fee for k8s cluster with free tier GKS<br>&nbsp; - using Tau T2A VM as Nodes in standard mode<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; - monthly 222 credit&nbsp; (t2a-standard-1 costs 34 monthly)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="20" width="340" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="m3cxBnHvqO1AkCnyJKCn-4" value="<div>SoftwareArch</div><div><br></div><div>Arch1: micro-service based webapp</div><div>&nbsp; - FE</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; - api-gw and web-gui</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - easier for CRUD presentation and pdf print</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; - oauth-proxy</div><div>&nbsp; - BE</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; - sale management related service</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - python/go for easier DB integration</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; - database</div><br><br>Arch2: compact standalone app (future)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" width="410" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 155px; margin-left: 2px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
DevOps
- GCP for production and staging environment
- region: us-central
- production portal with free tier GCE
- e2-micro: 2 vcpu
- 1GB ram
- 30GB PD
- 1g network egress
- static ip (for production service)
- production backend and CICD env with free tier GKS
- no managment fee for k8s cluster with free tier GKS
- using Tau T2A VM as Nodes in standard mode
- monthly 222 credit (t2a-standard-1 costs 34 monthly)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 408px; height: 1px; padding-top: 135px; margin-left: 352px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
SoftwareArch
Arch1: micro-service based webapp
- FE
- api-gw and web-gui
- easier for CRUD presentation and pdf print
- oauth-proxy
- BE
- sale management related service
- python/go for easier DB integration
- database
Arch2: compact standalone app (future)

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
